name: places/ChIJZVxZEwP0wokR5r5Ek10cVGk
adrFormatAddress: 4500 Broadway, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text:
I took a single pair of black jean shorts to dry clean because I accidentally got suntan lotion all over them. I gave them plenty of time no rush. I came back after 5 days only to find that the guy couldn't find my shorts anyway, he said to come back.

So I come back 3 days later, so now it's been 8 days and he finally gives me my shorts. I took them home and when I checked they were still dirty. He even charged me for it.

Yep, it's not worth the cheap price it's best to go to the Chino's up the block.

originalText.text:
I wish I had seen the reviews before coming here. I dropped my dress off and gave them sufficient time. I gave them exactly A WEEK. The guy told me that it would be ready on Friday and so Friday comes and it’s not ready that they had send it out same day!!! The lady that was there did not even apologize and she was just very nonchalant about everything. This is my first and last time coming here. DO NOT COME HEREEE!!!!

update 12/11/23
they still have not gotten my dress back. Its been almost 3 weeks and they keep telling me its not ready. I reported them to 311.

originalText.text: I will not be going back here. They are the most inconsistent cleaner service I ever encountered. Not only do they tell you "when" your clothes will be ready but when tou show up to the date THEY ARENT EVEN OPEN! They chose their own business hours and will screw you if you really need your clothes. DO NOT GO HERE.
